name: Creation Hero
overview:
Creation Hero enables rapid, successful employment of knowledge workers from across the planet.

This is achievable because of the contest based interviewing system which uses unique work projects in a contest format to filter hundreds of potential contractors effectively.

This then leaves those who can actually do the work regardless of what their resume’s or qualifications say.

In addition small projects up to $10,000 worth of services can be done directly via a contest alone.

As an ethically and morally aware company, contest winners and sometimes runners up are awarded a guaranteed cash prize and contest holders are guaranteed a successful outcome. Creating a win/win scenario.

Using this model enables a much broader pool of contractors to be accessed including those from emerging countries. The subsequent cost structure to the employer is reduced usually by an order of magnitude.

Harvard Business Review says

“A more efficient and effective mechanism for companies”

“A nascent trend”

“The new genre of project based hiring”
